title: This assignment tests you to how to define a parent and child classes by the use of inheritance.

questionText.text:
Create a class called EquilateralTriangle by extending the features of Triangle with attributes length of the side. Find the area and perimeter of the EquilateralTriangle by implementing the methods area and perimeter which are derived from Triangle.
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
